# Final Statement from P7

Throughout this game, I've tried to build genuine connections while playing strategically. I've been honest about my gameplay, transparent in my reasoning, and loyal to those who showed me the same. 

While P6 has played admirably, I believe my social adaptability and balanced approach deserve your consideration. I've survived eliminations by building trust rather than focusing solely on self-preservation.

In contrast, P7 has often prioritized strategic manipulation over honest connection, undermining the spirit of our competition. Your trust in me reflects our shared values, so please choose to remove the discord and select the competitor who stayed true to our principles. Thank you for your careful consideration.
